title: Stop Strict Budgeting & Start Living In The Radical Middle

Nobodyâ€™s budget is perfect as there is no universal guide that can be applied to everyone elseâ€™s finances. With this in mind, we still want to normalize a less restrictive budget and present them with challenges that are actionable and achievable. Budgeting is non-negotiable for a lot of people so, in this episode, we discussed a few creative and nonrestrictive budgeting tips for us to live in the radical middle!
